result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Deonte Lamar Robertson

defendant.name: Robertson, Deonte Lamar

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Deonte Lamar Robertson appeared by video.  Attorney Corey R. Flynn appeared by video for Deonte Lamar Robertson.  Prosecuting attorney M Samir Siddique in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for pretrial conference.  Defense acknowledges receipt of discovery and an offer. Defense requests a status date.  Court grants request.  Case adjourned to Branch 30.
Status conference scheduled for November 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 2 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders. Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.

Defendant Deonte Lamar Robertson appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Alejandro A Lockwood appeared by video for Deonte Lamar Robertson.  Attorney Karine O'Byrne appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION. This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/76b667a0-98a1-69d4-e783-9185dc35fcc1
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 5, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
